reviewText: My kids and i love Pingu. My daughter enjoys her Pingu dvds. And they came in the mail at a good time.
What the heck are those little penguins saying?  Who cares!  My 2 year old looovees it and I can name a handful of other shows/movies that I would rather her not watch.  So Sadie, Pingu on! :)

I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO SEE THIS DVD BECAUSE I NEED A REGION 2 PLAYER.
IF YOU CAN HELP ME FIND ONE THEN I WOULD BE ABLE TO SEE THIS. MY GRANDCHILD THAT LOVES PINGU WANTS TO SEE IT TOO.

With continuous random play you really can have Pingu forever!

We love you PINGU!
